newsitem.title: PHILIPPINES: Ramos orders Manila Bay toxic waste clean up.
newsitem.headline: Ramos orders Manila Bay toxic waste clean up.

text.p: Philippines President Fidel Ramos on Saturday ordered a clean up of Manila Bay after an estimated 30 tonnes of fish poisoned by chemicals washed ashore.
Ramos told the environment and public works departments and the fisheries bureau to take immediate preventive and corrective measures on toxic waste dumping in the bay.
Fishery bureau experts said chemical poisoning, possibly due to chemical spills from passing ships or from sewage, caused the worst case fish poisoning to date in the Manila Bay.
Manila Bay, renown for its sunsets, ranks among the country's leading tourist attractions.
